price: I nikako za bilo šta ne reci: “Uradit ću to sigurno sutra!” –
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاْيۡءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٞ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlanna lishāy'in innī fāʿilun dhālika ghadan
